definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The earliest automorphic functions to be studied were the elliptic modular functions .
sentences.chinese: 研究得最早的自导函数是椭圆模函数。

sentences.english: The wire guidance enables torpedo to close into homing contact with the target.
sentences.chinese: 有线制导能够使鱼雷接近致自导引触及目标。

sentences.english: Guiteau is believed to have acted on his own.
sentences.chinese: 人们相信吉托只是在自导自演。

sentences.english: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentences.chinese: 所有的皇家轿车都装有电子自导引装置。

sentences.english: I hide in dark corners, watching you from the speech self-guided play.
sentences.chinese: 我躲在黑暗的角落，看你们自演自导这出戏。

sentences.english: The earliest automorphic functions to be studied were the elliptic modular functions.
sentences.chinese: 研究得最早的自导函数是椭圆模函数。

sentences.english: The boy had staged his own kidnapping.
sentences.chinese: 男孩自导自演了这起绑架案。

sentences.english: In the end who is a self-speech?
He also repeated a self "drug" major, leading to defraud the trust.
sentences.chinese: 他还多次自导自演“缉毒”大案，以骗取领导信任。

definition: to control (the course of sth)/to guide (a missile)
